channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Stockholm)

item.title: 2022-01-25 13:00 Securing Infrastructure Evolution - KTH Software Research Meetup
item.description: # Abstract Infrastructure as Code is a popular approach to computing infrastructure management that allows users to leverage tools such as version control, automatic deployments, and program analysis for infrastructure configurations. Infrastructures can and will evolve wi...

item.title: 2022-02-23 08:00 This weeks Lean Coffee - Stockholm Lean Coffee
